phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
Phantom's Magical Giant has activated and is trying to cast Abyss Break to destroy all of Magnolia!
And fierce battles with the Element 4 have begun, as they wait to ambush us after we broke inside!
In one battle, Mira has been taken hostage, and when Elfman sees her...
I will yell it out countless times.
I believe your every tomorrow will be shining.
And that is why we are not going to lose!
When it seems like you will be blown away by the headwinds,
grasp this hand, try to take a chance.
Because you are not alone anymore, got it?
Do not give up on your awesome dream!
That is right, do not cry!
Now, with the light shining down upon you.
Do not even think about something like giving up!
Even if you trade being hurt again for strength.
Your eyes, always looking straight ahead,
I could have sworn Phantom was attacking...
So go right back to sleep...
A Flower Blooms in the Rain
With non of three, you misunderstand me!
I, Monsieur, gave you such a harsh trial for you to finally overcome your difficult past, bonsoir!
You are indeed a Man among men, Elfman!
I, Monsieur, believed you could overcome it!
Well then, if you will be excusing me...
Do not let your guard down now.
Non, at least let me fall unconscious!
Could you have lost your reason again?
You must never have wanted to see me like this again.
Because I was not able to control it, Lisanna...
But I did not know what else to do.
I had to get stronger to protect you and Fairy Tail!
Lisanna's death was not your fault.
You were trying your best to protect us both back then.
To live on in her stead.
To work as hard as we could...
I am so glad you are all right!
And how is crying going to help anything?
The giant is not writing as quickly...
The forbidden magic of the four elements...
Elfman, how many of the Element 4 are left?
That would make two left, I guess?
Each time we get one of them, the giant's movements slow down!
In other words, this giant is powered by the four elements.
If we can defeat all of the Element 4, we can stop the magic!
The remaining two should be somewhere inside the giant!
Focus on the enemy in front of you and protect Fairy Tail!
You do not know when to quit...
It is the women in our guild who are the strong ones...
He said something worried him, so he headed to that place.
If Abyss Break is cast, then that place would not be safe either.
I just thought of something good, Happy!
If we beat up Jose, then that would end the fight, right?
Jose's just as powerful as our own master!
Someone like you could never beat him, Natsu!
But Gramps is not here, so who else is going to?
I was trying not to think about it, but you made me remember!
No matter what happens in this war, in the end Jose will...
I am here, are not I?
The master and Erza have more magic power,
but there is something about Natsu that gives everyone hope!
Ah, and all that is left is the corpse of a dragon!
Natsu, he is one of the Element 4!
I am at the top of the Element 4!
And I have come to hunt me a dragon!
I am already used to you guys.
Yes... Juvia is the rain woman, one of the Element 4.
You are one of the Element 4?
I never would have thought that two of the elements would have been defeated.
But do not underestimate Juvia and Aria.
Sorry to break it to you, but I do not go easy on people who hurt my friends.
Even if they are women or children...
Why is my heart beating like this?
Juvia wants to make him her's!
Juvia can no longer hold back!
I must release him quick, or...
He escaped from Juvia's water lock using his own power?
This is the power of an ice wizard...
It is like we are bound by fate!
I have finally found you, Juvia's Prince!
Trying for a surprise attack, you bastard!
I-I-I think we should take things more slowly...
I do not want to frighten a woman, but you would better surrender immediately.
Otherwise you are going to get hurt!
Juvia's body is made of water.
Torn apart by strife, that is their tearful fate!
But Juvia will not lose heart!
Farewell, my small blossom of love!
High powered water jets can even cut through steel.
Underestimate water, and you will regret it.
Try again and again, but nothing will change.
Against Juvia, physical attacks are ineffective.
You still have a chance to save yourself.
If you do, I will ask my master to withdraw.
Hey, do not give me that crap.
We are both already way past the point of retreating.
I will give up my life before handing her over to you!
My heart feels like it is going to rend asunder!
And why are you mad at Lucy?
My Creation Magic cannot keep up!
Ever since Juvia was born, she is lived within the rain.
In the rain, there is no one who can defeat Juvia!
Inside the rain is Juvia's world!
He used the steam as a smoke screen?
He is not just a pretty face, he is smart, too.
I do not have time to take a break!
I have got to stop that magic quick!
This is the end for you!
He flew straight into the boiling water!
Like this, forever, inside your ice...
He released me from the ice?
Juvia cannot bring herself to harm you...
So you are admitting you cannot win against me?
Juvia will be able to protect you.
Sheesh, now the rain's gotten stronger.
Man, this rain is so gloomy...
He is no different than all the others!
Juvia has no need for love anymore!
Is it even hotter than before?
I wish Juvia would take a long vacation...
When she is around it is always raining and gloomy.
I cannot go fishing or camping with you around.
But Juvia does not know what else to do...
I cannot stand this gloom anymore.
The longer it rains, the gloomier it gets!
Juvia is nothing but a gloomy rain woman!
And yet Phantom Lord accepted Juvia for who she is!
Juvia is one of the Element 4!
I am not going to lose!
Juvia, like a raindrop, will fall to the ground, and scatter into tiny fragments...
A fitting end to an unwanted rain woman...
Do not let go of my hand!
I am not letting you fall!
Oh, it is finally clearing up.
I have never seen them before...
A lot of time has passed, but the magic has not activated yet!
This is bad for my heart.
How long until it is over?
Wait, is not that giant moving turtlish?
She means it is moving more slowly, I think.
Try speaking so we can understand you!
Natsu and the others inside are doing their best to hold it back, I bet.
I guess we should clean them up, then.
So this is the third Element 4?
Why does she look so happy?
Maybe she is having a nice dream.
If we can defeat one more, we can stop Abyss Break.
The Magic Giant moves using the power of the Element 4.
I was put to sleep by Mira...
I guess I was in everyone is way.
We just wanted to protect our friend.
Getting in the way does not have anything to do with it.
But that is why I cannot just sit here!
I have got to go back!
You do well to remain standing.
I have never seen Natsu in such a one-sided fight!
But in the face of my Airspace magic, you are powerless!
What the hell is Airspace magic?
Because I am a Fairy Tail wizard!
Now I am fired up, you bastard!
Defeat one more, and we stop that magic!
But there is still Gajeel and Master Jose.
I wonder if I can get something to eat before fighting them.
Then let us search for the kitchen first!
If she finds out we are taking a break here, she will get mad!
